thread.title: Save the Children Media Alert--Philippines, Typhoon Koppu: Spokespeople Available from Manila
thread.title_full: Save the Children Media Alert--Philippines, Typhoon Koppu: Spokespeople Available from Manila - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Save the Children Media Alert--Philippines, Typhoon Koppu: Spokespeople Available from Manila
text:
Save the Children
/PRNewswire-USNewswire/ -- Save the Children's emergency response teams are monitoring the situation and are on standby for immediate deployment to meet the needs of children who may be affected by the impact of Typhoon Koppu (known locally as Lando), which is expected to make landfall tonight Eastern Time, which is Sunday morning Philippine time.
FAIRFIELD, Conn. , Oct. 17, 2015 Emergency supplies and relief kits are in place to get to those who are affected, if necessary. These include mobile health units; newborn kits and safe delivery kits; household kits; plastic sheeting; water kits; family hygiene kits; water, sanitation and hygiene (WASH) equipment; temporary learning space tents; back-to-school kits and child friendly space kits.
Save the Children spokespeople, including the organization's country director in the Philippines , Ned Olney , are available for interviews via Skype and telephone from Manila . Please contact Ajla Grozdanic at agrozdanic@savechildren.org or 202.251.5859 for more information and to schedule an interview.
Save the Children gives children in the United States and around the world a healthy start, the opportunity to learn and protection from harm. We invest in childhood - every day, in times of crisis and for our future. Follow us on Twitter and Facebook .
Media Contact
Ajla Grozdanic , agrozdanic@savechildren.org , 202.251.5859
